Projects

Multi-user screen html5 screensharing
Client: Cliff Larson

Developed a HTML5 full screen-sharing application, which allows one to many screensharing right from the browser. Node.JS and specialized Binary websockets were used for smooth screen-sharing experience.

Global Management System
Client: RoomProTech

Developed the Global mangement system for RoomProTech which allows them to control thousands of RPT devices, view reports and manage compaines and employees online. Developed the complete web app and server, AngularJS is used on the front-end and Node.JS is used on the server.

Developed SAP Hanna + Web App
Client: Shoeb Javed (CTO Worksoft)

Developed web front-end and REST api's for Widgets of a SAP HANNA application. The Front-end MVC used is AngularJS and custom widgets were developed in d3.js. For other widgets wijmo is used. The server is written in Java.

Gyanmobile - Web Education Platform
Client: Gyanmobile

Developed an education platform, which is a Coursera like web application, which provides test, peer performance comparison and performance analysis.

Ken - Magazine for Programmers
Android Application (featured on XDA-Developers)

Developed native android application in Java, which communicates with server via REST api's. The server is written in Python, which scrapes the web for latest programming related content. Google Play Link

Custom Jquery Plugins and Animations
Client: Nortsa

Developed custom jQuery plugins for animations and various custom effects. Also modifed existing plugins to exibit custom behaviour and resolved confilt amoung the plugins.

About

My name is Mohammed Lakkadshaw, I love developing web and mobile applications. I like to work on open-source projects in my free time. I also love reading and playing video games. :)
